description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The AMB_COND_CD table holds ambulance transport condition codes.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: AMB_TRANS_COND_CD
columns.description: This item holds codes that describe the patient's condition when ambulance services were provided.
